title: Organizational Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Engineering Core Concept Integration and Assessment Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering mathematics (calculus) and understanding of classical mechanics concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can connect static/dynamic concepts with multivariable calculus to solve real-world problems
Conceptual understanding and application skills can be improved by over 20% through peer assessment and feedback systems
Over 80% of learners utilize team-based problem-solving strategies during integrated project implementation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
